description.en: Stable++ is a pioneering decentralized protocol on the Nervos CKB blockchain, built on the RGB++ layer to enhance Bitcoin's scalability and programmability. As the first over-collateralized stablecoin protocol on CKB, Stable++ allows users to mint BUSD stablecoins by over-collateralizing BTC assets, bringing stability and liquidity to the Bitcoin and RGB++ ecosystems. It leverages CKB's Proof-of-Work (PoW) consensus and Cell model, combined with the RGB++ protocol's Bitcoin UTXO to CKB Cell mapping, to provide secure and scalable stablecoin issuance and trading.
description.ch: Stable++ 是 Nervos CKB 区块链上的开创性去中心化协议，基于 RGB++ 层构建，增强了比特币的可扩展性和可编程性。作为 CKB 上第一个超额抵押稳定币协议，Stable++ 允许用户通过超额抵押 BTC 资产来铸造 BUSD 稳定币，为比特币和 RGB++ 生态系统带来稳定性和流动性。它利用 CKB 的工作量证明 (PoW) 共识和 Cell 模型，结合 RGB++ 协议的比特币 UTXO 到 CKB Cell 的映射，提供安全可扩展的稳定币发行和交易。

description.en: Stable++ launches the first decentralized, over-collateralized stablecoin protocol on CKB, ensuring stability and trustlessness within the Bitcoin ecosystem
description.ch: Stable++ 推出 CKB 上首个去中心化、超额抵押稳定币协议，确保比特币生态系统内的稳定性和去信任化

description.en: Built on the RGB++ protocol, Stable++ enhances Bitcoin's smart contract capabilities, enabling secure and scalable stablecoin issuance and trading
description.ch: 基于 RGB++ 协议构建，Stable++ 增强比特币的智能合约功能，实现安全可扩展的稳定币发行和交易

a.en: Stable++ uses CKB's PoW consensus and Cell model, combined with the RGB++ protocol, to issue and manage stablecoins backed by over-collateralized assets, ensuring stability and security.
a.ch: Stable++ 使用 CKB 的 PoW 共识和 Cell 模型，结合 RGB++ 协议，发行和管理由超额抵押资产支持的稳定币，确保稳定性和安全性。

q.en: Which wallets are compatible with Stable++?
q.ch: 哪些钱包与 Stable++ 兼容？

a.en: Stable++ supports mainstream Bitcoin wallets like Unisat, OKX, and JoyID, allowing users to seamlessly interact with the protocol.
a.ch: Stable++ 支持 Unisat、OKX 和 JoyID 等主流比特币钱包，允许用户无缝与协议交互。

a.en: By using an over-collateralization model, Stable++ ensures stablecoin values are backed by excess collateral, reducing volatility and enhancing trust.
a.ch: 通过使用超额抵押模型，Stable++ 确保稳定币价值由超额抵押品支持，减少波动性并增强信任度。

q.en: What is the purpose of Stable++ stablecoins?
q.ch: Stable++ 稳定币的目的是什么？

a.en: Stable++ aims to provide stable, decentralized value storage for DeFi applications, trading, and asset management within the Bitcoin and CKB ecosystems.
a.ch: Stable++ 旨在为比特币和 CKB 生态系统内的 DeFi 应用、交易和资产管理提供稳定的去中心化价值存储。
